page.title: 10THE GLEBE SCHOOL.
page.content: The school is an open plan school.It is a Primary school but it used to be an Infant and Junior until 1981.The school is mainly built of brick and has lots of windows. The roofs are made of felt and covered in tar. The roofs are flat,so if it rains very hard the roof leaks.The school has one big playing field and two yards.Also it has two halls,the main hall and the Infant hall.There are 11 classes in the school.The main subjects are English,Maths,Science,Geography and History.We have lots of clubs like sewing,drama,football,recorder and book club.We have lots of computers in the school and we are setting up a satellite link with a school in San Diego U.S.A. We have music lessons such as Violin,Guitar,Cello and Brass.The school has 12 teachers,a Headmistress and a Secretary.
